mapper.select: SELECT IFNULL(mbrsh_pgm_id, ' ') mbrsh_pgm_id, IFNULL(telgrm_typ, ' ') telgrm_typ, IFNULL(cncl_yn, ' ') cncl_yn, IF(#{telgrm_fg} = 'BT', '02', IFNULL(msg_fg, '02')) msg_fg, IFNULL(mcht_mng_yn, 'N') mcht_mng_yn FROM rul_svcavl_con where organ_cd = #{organ_cd} and telgrm_no = #{telgrm_no} and svc_modu_id = #{svc_modu_id} and apl_yn = 'Y'
